external_references.description: Meyers, A. (2013, March 29). Whois Numbered Panda. Retrieved January 14, 2016.

description: [APT12](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0005) has used multiple variants of [DNS Calculation](https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/T1568/003) including multiplying the first two octets of an IP address and adding the third octet to that value in order to get a resulting command and control port.(Citation: Meyers Numbered Panda)
